toolName: SADUC (Samba Active Directory Users and Computers)
description: A UI specification for an Active Directory Users and Computers-like management tool running on Linux, leveraging Samba for backend interactions.

mainWindow.layout: Standard application window with menu bar, toolbar area, central widget with splitters for panes, and status bar.

action.label: &Action
items: New (sub-menu: User, Group, Computer, Contact, Organizational Unit)

view.label: &View
items: Customize View (sub-menu for main window components)

help.label: &Help
items: About Active Directory Users and Computers

toolbarArea.description: Standard toolbar below menu bar, with configurable visibility via View menu.

centralPaneArea.layout: Two vertical splitters creating three main panes: Left (tree), Middle (list), Right (action).

adContainerTreeView.content: Hierarchical tree view of Active Directory domains, OUs, and built-in containers.
adContainerTreeView.selectionBehavior: Single selection of OU/Container. Drives adObjectListView content and Action Pane OU/Container header.

adObjectListView.content: Displays objects (Users, Groups, Computers, Contacts) within the selected container from the adContainerTreeView.
adObjectListView.columns: Configurable via 'Add/Remove Columns...' dialog. Default columns: Name, Type, Description. Sortable by columns.

interactions.doubleClick: Opens Properties Dialog for the object.
interactions.rightClick: Opens context menu specific to the object type (same tasks as Action Pane for that object).

actionPaneWidget.description: Dynamic, contextual task pane. Visibility toggleable via View menu.

ouContainerHeaderBar.content: Name of currently selected OU/Container from left pane.
ouContainerHeaderBar.leftToggle: Up/down arrow (default down/expanded), controls visibility of OU/Container tasks below.
ouContainerHeaderBar.rightMoreActionsToggle: Right arrow with white background, opens context menu for the selected OU/Container.

selectedObjectHeaderBar.conditionalVisibility: Only appears when an object is selected in adObjectListView.
selectedObjectHeaderBar.content: Name of currently selected object from right pane.
selectedObjectHeaderBar.leftToggle: Up/down arrow (default down/expanded), controls visibility of object tasks below.
selectedObjectHeaderBar.rightMoreActionsToggle: Right arrow with white background, opens context menu for the selected object.

containerSelected: New (sub-menu/expanded list: User, Group, Computer, Contact, Organizational Unit)
View -> (sub-menu/expanded list: Add/Remove Columns..., Filter Options...)

exclusions: Shared Folder objects (no tasks, not filterable, not displayed)
Printer objects (no tasks, not filterable, not displayed)
Service objects (no tasks, not filterable, not displayed)
Management options for Computer/DC objects (e.g., 'Manage') due to Linux environment limitations.

statusBar.content: Blank by default. Displays brief info on selected items or hovered menu actions.

dynamicUpdates.menuHover: Brief description of the hovered menu item's function.

descriptionBar.location: Top of the right pane (above adObjectListView)
descriptionBar.content: Displays 'OU/Container Name (Number of objects)', e.g., 'Users (150 objects)'.

findNow.label: 'Find Now'
elements: Find: dropdown (defaults to 'Users, Contacts, and Groups')
In: dropdown (defaults to current domain, with 'Browse...' button for OU/container selection)
Search criteria section (dropdowns for Field, Condition, Value, with Add/Remove buttons, Condition List box)

customSearch.label: 'Custom Search'
elements: Field, Condition, Value interface (reused by Filter Options 'Customize...' button)

filterOptionsDialog.title: 'Filtering Options'

radioButtons.label: 'Show only the following types of object:'

customizeButton.label: 'Customize...'
customizeButton.behavior: Opens Custom Filter Builder Dialog (reuses Find Objects Custom Search interface).

maxItemsDisplayed.label: 'Maximum number of items displayed per folder:'

filterOptionsDialog.persistence: Last-used filter settings are loaded on dialog open and app start.

createIn.label: 'Create in:'
createIn.path: Non-editable, fixed to source user's container (NO browse button).

page2_passwordOptions.title: Password and Account Options
checkboxes: User must change password at next logon (pre-populated from source, usually checked for new user)
User cannot change password (pre-populated from source)

page3_confirmation.title: Confirmation
summary: Selected options from previous dialog: [Summary of account options]

newUserDialog.title: 'New Object - User'
newUserDialog.description: Identical structure and fields to Copy User Dialog, but without 'confirmation copy from' and checkboxes default to typical new user settings (e.g., 'User must change password at next logon' checked).
newUserDialog.pages: Same as copyUserDialog, with minor content adjustments.

containerSelectionDialog.content: QTreeView of Active Directory hierarchy. Only TLD expanded initially. Only OUs/Containers selectable.

contactPropertiesDialog.title: 'Contact Name Properties'

topRow: Attribute Editor (if Advanced View is on)

contactPropertiesDialog.similarity: Similar to User Properties Dialog, excluding AE for users.
